verses.verse: And it came to pass after <WH310> these things <WH1697>, that 'Elohim <WH430> did tempt <WH5254> <WH8765> Avraham <WH85>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Avraham <WH85>: and he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Behold, here I am.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Take now <WH3947> <WH8798> thy son <WH1121>, thine only <WH3173> son Yitz'chak <WH3327>, whom thou lovest <WH157> <WH8804>, and get thee <WH3212> <WH8798> into the land <WH776> of Moriah <WH4179>; and offer him <WH5927> <WH8685> there for a burnt offering <WH5930> upon one <WH259> of the mountains <WH2022> which I will tell <WH559> <WH8799> thee of.

And Avraham <WH85> rose up early <WH7925> <WH8686> in the morning <WH1242>, and saddled <WH2280> <WH8799> his ass <WH2543>, and took <WH3947> <WH8799> two <WH8147> of his young men <WH5288> with him, and Yitz'chak <WH3327> his son <WH1121>, and clave <WH1234> <WH8762> the wood <WH6086> for the burnt offering <WH5930>, and rose up <WH6965> <WH8799>, and went <WH3212> <WH8799> unto the place <WH4725> of which 'Elohim <WH430> had told <WH559> <WH8804> him.
Then on the third <WH7992> day <WH3117> Avraham <WH85> lifted up <WH5375> <WH8799> his eyes <WH5869>, and saw <WH7200> <WH8799> the place <WH4725> afar off <WH7350>.

And Avraham <WH85> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto his young men <WH5288>, Abide <WH3427> <WH8798> ye here with the ass <WH2543>; and I and the lad <WH5288> will go <WH3212> <WH8799> yonder <WH3541> and worship <WH7812> <WH8691>, and come again <WH7725> <WH8799> to you.

And Avraham <WH85> took <WH3947> <WH8799> the wood <WH6086> of the burnt offering <WH5930>, and laid <WH7760> <WH8799> it upon Yitz'chak <WH3327> his son <WH1121>; and he took <WH3947> <WH8799> the fire <WH784> in his hand <WH3027>, and a knife <WH3979>; and they went <WH3212> <WH8799> both <WH8147> of them together <WH3162>.

And Yitz'chak <WH3327> spake <WH559> <WH8799> unto Avraham <WH85> his father <WH1>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, My father <WH1>: and he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Here am I, my son <WH1121>. And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Behold the fire <WH784> and the wood <WH6086>: but where is the lamb <WH7716> for a burnt offering <WH5930> ?

And Avraham <WH85> said <WH559> <WH8799>, My son <WH1121>, 'Elohim <WH430> will provide <WH7200> <WH8799> himself a lamb <WH7716> for a burnt offering <WH5930>: so they went <WH3212> <WH8799> both of them <WH8147> together <WH3162>.

And they came <WH935> <WH8799> to the place <WH4725> which 'Elohim <WH430> had told <WH559> <WH8804> him of; and Avraham <WH85> built <WH1129> <WH8799> an altar <WH4196> there, and laid <WH6186> the wood <WH6086> in order <WH6186> <WH8799>, and bound <WH6123> <WH8799> Yitz'chak <WH3327> his son <WH1121>, and laid <WH7760> <WH8799> him on the altar <WH4196> upon <WH4605> the wood <WH6086>.
And Avraham <WH85> stretched forth <WH7971> <WH8799> his hand <WH3027>, and took <WH3947> <WH8799> the knife <WH3979> to slay <WH7819> <WH8800> his son <WH1121>.
And the angel <WH4397> of the YY <WH3068> called <WH7121> <WH8799> unto him out of heaven <WH8064>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Avraham <WH85>, Avraham <WH85>: and he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Here am I.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Lay <WH7971> <WH8799> not thine hand <WH3027> upon <WH413> the lad <WH5288>, neither do thou <WH6213> <WH8799> any thing <WH3972> unto him: for now <WH6258> I know <WH3045> <WH8804> that thou fearest <WH3373> 'Elohim <WH430>, seeing thou hast not <WH3808> withheld <WH2820> <WH8804> thy son <WH1121>, thine only <WH3173> son from me.

And Avraham <WH85> lifted up <WH5375> <WH8799> his eyes <WH5869>, and looked <WH7200> <WH8799>, and behold behind <WH310> him a ram <WH352> caught <WH270> <WH8737> in a thicket <WH5442> by his shofars <WH7161>: and Avraham <WH85> went <WH3212> <WH8799> and took <WH3947> <WH8799> the ram <WH352>, and offered him up <WH5927> <WH8686> for a burnt offering <WH5930> in the stead <WH8478> of his son <WH1121>.

And Avraham <WH85> called <WH7121> <WH8799> the name <WH8034> of that place <WH4725> Jehovahjireh <WH3070>: as <WH834> it is said <WH559> <WH8735> to this day <WH3117>, In the mount <WH2022> of the YY <WH3068> it shall be seen <WH7200> <WH8735>.
And the angel <WH4397> of the YY <WH3068> called <WH7121> <WH8799> unto Avraham <WH85> out of heaven <WH8064> the second time <WH8145>,

And said <WH559> <WH8799>, By myself have I sworn <WH7650> <WH8738>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>, for because <WH3282> <WH834> thou hast done <WH6213> <WH8804> this thing <WH1697>, and hast not <WH3808> withheld <WH2820> <WH8804> thy son <WH1121>, thine only <WH3173> son:

That in b'rakhah <WH1288> <WH8763> I will bless <WH1288> <WH8762> thee, and in multiplying <WH7235> <WH8687> I will multiply <WH7235> <WH8686> thy seed <WH2233> as the stars <WH3556> of the heaven <WH8064>, and as the sand <WH2344> which is upon the sea <WH3220> shore <WH8193>; and thy seed <WH2233> shall possess <WH3423> <WH8799> the gate <WH8179> of his enemies <WH341> <WH8802>;
And in thy seed <WH2233> shall all the nations <WH1471> of the earth <WH776> be blessed <WH1288> <WH8694>; because <WH834> <WH6118> thou hast obeyed <WH8085> <WH8804> my voice <WH6963>.

So Avraham <WH85> returned <WH7725> <WH8799> unto his young men <WH5288>, and they rose up <WH6965> <WH8799> and went <WH3212> <WH8799> together <WH3162> to Be'er-Sheva <WH884>; and Avraham <WH85> dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> at Be'er-Sheva <WH884>.

And it came to pass after <WH310> these things <WH1697>, that it was told <WH5046> <WH8714> Avraham <WH85>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Behold, Milcah <WH4435>, she hath also born <WH3205> <WH8804> children <WH1121> unto thy brother <WH251> Nahor <WH5152>;
Huz <WH5780> his firstborn <WH1060>, and Buz <WH938> his brother <WH251>, and Kemuel <WH7055> the father <WH1> of Aram <WH758>,
And Chesed <WH3777>, and Hazo <WH2375>, and Pildash <WH6394>, and Jidlaph <WH3044>, and Bethuel <WH1328>.
And Bethuel <WH1328> begat <WH3205> <WH8804> Rebekah <WH7259>: these eight <WH8083> Milcah <WH4435> did bear <WH3205> <WH8804> to Nahor <WH5152>, Avraham's <WH85> brother <WH251>.
And his concubine <WH6370>, whose name <WH8034> was Reumah <WH7208>, she bare <WH3205> <WH8799> also Tebah <WH2875>, and Gaham <WH1514>, and Thahash <WH8477>, and Maachah <WH4601>.
